title: Emotions & Stress
description: Learn B1-entry emotional expression for daily and work life.

steps.teacher: 最近我有點累，事情有點多。
expected_answer: 最近我有點累，事情有點多。
steps.pinyin: zuì jìn wǒ yǒu diǎn lèi, shì qíng yǒu diǎn duō.
steps.english_hint: I feel a bit tired lately; there's a lot going on.

steps.teacher: 有時候我會覺得壓力很大。
expected_answer: 有時候我會覺得壓力很大。
steps.pinyin: yǒu shí hòu wǒ huì jué dé yā lì hěn dà.
steps.english_hint: Sometimes I feel a lot of pressure.

steps.teacher: 我需要花一點時間讓自己冷靜下來。
expected_answer: 我需要花一點時間讓自己冷靜下來。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xū yào huā yì diǎn shí jiān ràng zì jǐ lěng jìng xià lái.
steps.english_hint: I need some time to calm myself down.

steps.teacher: 運動常常能幫我放鬆心情。
expected_answer: 運動常常能幫我放鬆心情。
steps.pinyin: yùn dòng cháng cháng néng bāng wǒ fàng sōng xīn qíng.

steps.teacher: 我覺得跟朋友聊天很療癒。
expected_answer: 我覺得跟朋友聊天很療癒。
steps.pinyin: wǒ jué dé gēn péng yǒu liáo tiān hěn liáo yù.
steps.english_hint: Chatting with friends feels healing to me.

steps.teacher: 有時候我會提醒自己慢慢來。
expected_answer: 有時候我會提醒自己慢慢來。
steps.pinyin: yǒu shí hòu wǒ huì tí xǐng zì jǐ màn màn lái.
steps.english_hint: Sometimes I remind myself to take it slow.

steps.teacher: 我正在學習更好地管理時間。
expected_answer: 我正在學習更好地管理時間。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zhèng zài xué xí gèng hǎo de guǎn lǐ shí jiān.
steps.english_hint: I'm learning to manage my time better.

steps.teacher: 雖然有壓力，但我知道自己做得到。
expected_answer: 雖然有壓力，但我知道自己做得到。
steps.pinyin: suī rán yǒu yā lì, dàn wǒ zhī dào zì jǐ zuò de dào.
steps.english_hint: Although there's pressure, I know I can do it.

steps.teacher: 我需要一點安靜的時間休息。
expected_answer: 我需要一點安靜的時間休息。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xū yào yì diǎn ān jìng de shí jiān xiū xí.
steps.english_hint: I need some quiet time to rest.

steps.teacher: 我相信狀態會慢慢變好。
expected_answer: 我相信狀態會慢慢變好。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xiāng xìn zhuàng tài huì màn màn biàn hǎo.
steps.english_hint: I believe things will get better gradually.

review.summary: You learned natural B1-entry emotional expressions.
